mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HNYC_TRADEMARK_INFO (trademarkCode, trademarkName, codeFullName, f_isInside, producingArea, maker, f_senior, f_stress, f_trademarkHundreds, province, status, codeGbm, factory) VALUES ( #{trademark_code ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trademark_name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code_full_name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{f_isinside ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{producing_area ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maker ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{f_senior ,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{f_stress ,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{f_trademark_hundreds ,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{province ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status ,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{code_gbm ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factory ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE HNYC_TRADEMARK_INFO SET trademarkName = #{trademark_name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, codeFullName = #{code_full_name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_isInside = #{f_isinside ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, producingArea = #{producing_area ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maker = #{maker ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_senior = #{f_senior ,jdbcType=CHAR}, f_stress = #{f_stress ,jdbcType=CHAR}, f_trademarkHundreds = #{f_trademark_hundreds ,jdbcType=CHAR}, province = #{province ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status ,jdbcType=CHAR}, codeGbm = #{code_gbm ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, factory = #{factory ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE trademarkCode = #{trademark_code ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
